name: Orb Bois
description:
WASD or arrow keys to move   Space to swap orbs

The white orb can get hit by the red blocks 3 times before you lose.

Only 3 levels including tutorial

----------------------------------

First time trying to make a playable game. I would like to add better levels with more obstacles, maybe some sentries shooting but I'm new to developing games and this took too long as it stands 

Couldn't figure out how to add sound effects ;(

No art cause I figured anything I make will look worse the the minimal aesthetic it already has.
